overview:
John oversees marketing and sales for Theo. He is currently focused on the launch of myTheo and TheoTour in San Francisco.

John has been involved with technology sales and real estate for over 15 years, having worked in senior sales and marketing roles at Wired Magazine, Jupiter Communications, Guru.com. In 2003 he launched his real estate career at Pacific Union, where he was one of the firms top agents. Seeing that the real estate industry had many inefficiencies and was ripe for revolutionary changes, he and his partners founded Theo.
